mapper.select: select i_id,i_imgcnt,i_detail,i_name,i_cost from info order by to_number(i_cost) desc
select i_id,i_imgcnt,i_detail,i_name,i_cost from info order by to_number(i_cost) asc
select i_id,i_imgcnt,i_detail,i_name,i_cost from info order by i_name
select i_id,i_imgcnt,i_detail,i_name,i_cost from info where i_id like 'LI%'
select i_id,i_imgcnt,i_detail,i_name,i_cost from info where i_id like 'LI%' order by to_number(i_cost) desc
select i_id,i_imgcnt,i_detail,i_name,i_cost from info where i_id like 'LI%' order by to_number(i_cost) asc
select i_id,i_imgcnt,i_detail,i_name,i_cost from info where i_id like 'LI%' order by i_name
